TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventPrivateKey extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides unique identification for events whose handlers are stored into an internal hashtable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!IMPORTANT] > This type exists specifically so that compilers, build rules, or other enforcement mechanisms can verify that all event keys of this type are created exclusively by private static fields on the event-declaring class. Failure to make the event key private raises the possibility of event spoofing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
